hero.headline: Hi, I'm Ollie.
hero.subheadline: I help marketing teams work smarter by blending creativity and systems thinking to build experiences, workflows and content that scale.

content.title: Ollie Pinto
content.bio: Bridging the gap between creative storytelling and systems thinking. I build marketing engines that give teams room to breathe and do their best work.

content.title: Creative Background
content.text: Started making YouTube videos in 2009. Began my career hands-on with video, then moved through design, UX and marketing. Now I'm adding more technical work to the mix thanks to AI tools.

content.desc: Designed a mobile app called Drops Music. Built the UI, made an animated prototype, and led a crew to shoot integrated content.

content.title: Personal Interests
content.text: Chelsea supporter. FPL obsessive. Into mindfulness, reading, music, podcasts, AI and tech. Always curious about how people and technology evolve together.

work.headline: Experience Archive
work.subheadline: An overview of where I've worked and what I've built along the way.

projects.short_desc: Blending creative work with systems thinking to scale marketing.
full_desc: Drove consistent YoY growth in social impressions and engagement. Shaped our tone of voice, ran regular performance standups, and created actionable optimisations that led to strong client feedback.

Built a multi-step automation to modernise inbound lead processing. Filters spam, uses AI to generate company summaries and calculate ICP scores, then routes qualified leads instantly to Slack. Significantly reduced irrelevant leads.
Created custom AI systems for the team that contextualise each request for ICP fit, tone of voice and proposition matching.
Managed WordPress CMS and implemented cost-saving CRM solutions for email marketing.

projects.short_desc: Helped secure $1.1m revenue for Sky Broadband Gaming Plan.
full_desc: Coordinated development and design of the new website, writing copy and optimising SEO.
Devised and executed B2B strategy, including investor newsletters and LinkedIn cadence.
Created a custom AI tone-of-voice tool to enable consistent brand messaging.
Led Sky partnership social activity, contributing to 80.6m impressions.

projects.short_desc: Supported digital activity for a major B2B Private Credit rebrand.
full_desc: Played a key role in the successful B2B rebrand of the Private Credit business line.
Coordinated effective campaigns resulting in increased engagement with investors.
Managed suppliers for high-quality video, webinar and presentation production.
Supported digital marketing efforts, optimising website UX/SEO and managing LinkedIn campaigns.

projects.short_desc: Streamlined procurement and updated brand assets.
full_desc: Completed and streamlined procurement processes, including liaising with suppliers and logging invoices.
Updated company template assets for a planned rebrand, ensuring smooth transition.

projects.short_desc: Designed animated prototypes for a fashion social commerce startup.
full_desc: Created a promotional video for the mobile app and a website showcase animation.
Transformed UI assets into animated features using 2D and 3D motion software.
Enhanced the company's prospects among retailers and investors through high-fidelity prototypes.

projects.short_desc: Work experience in the Promotions department at UMG.
full_desc: Completed travel requisitions, updated department data entries.
Booked travel and assisted celebrity talent appearing on This Morning.

projects.short_desc: Boosted SEO and produced creative assets for agency clients.
full_desc: Completed client work in corporate video editing, graphic design and motion graphics.
Boosted SEO of digital channels, writing blog posts for improved discoverability.
Standardised the agency's SEO processes with a custom guide.

projects.short_desc: Produced content for gaming channels with several 100k+ view videos.
full_desc: Managed YouTube channel for popular Twitch personality.
Produced card reveal videos and instructional content in association with Blizzard Entertainment.
Successfully grew the channel to over 10,000 subscribers.
Rotated through creative departments, specialising in Brand Experience.
Worked on internal branding for Game of Thrones S6, Sky Difference and Sky Wilmslow.
Produced a broadcasted promo for Z Nation on Pick TV and created assets for Sky Sports.

lab.headline: Experiments & Prototypes
lab.description: A little playground for my curiosity. Trying out ideas about work, writing about AI, and building tools that make boring tasks less boring.

experiments.title: Living Prototype
experiments.desc: My Substack where I write about work, life and how emerging tech is changing the modern workplace.

experiments.title: AI Lead Triage Engine
experiments.desc: A multi-step automation to modernise inbound B2B lead processing. It filters spam, uses AI to generate company summaries and calculate ICP scores, then routes qualified leads instantly to Slack for the sales team.

experiments.title: Vibe Coding Architecture
experiments.desc: This portfolio is a live case study in vibe coding. Built by leveraging Gemini 3.0 to architect a high-performance, modern tech stack, it demonstrates how non-coders can deploy production-grade websites without getting stuck in boilerplate.
